alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:11PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Price County through 445 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hawkins, or 17 miles east of Ladysmith, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Catawba around 425 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ogema. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Wisconsin.
